name: WakaiMan (InDev)
description:
You are a famous youtuber who was dared by your biggest fans to live in a abandoned hotel named ("Nora apartment"), you easily accepted the challenge and did it right away, but little did you know it was not just an abandoned hotel, rumors say it was raided by a terrorist group before, and there were myths saying there are 3 ghosts wandering the apartment,

Wakaiman is a horror strategy game where you need to be quick minded to do stuff or else youll die, Its a little inspired by fnaf cause of the nights system, but its a free roam game, also you need to maintain these things to help you survive

- Always maintain your flashlight battery by charging it in a nearby generator,

- Always get hydrated

Note : this game is In dev, so pls understand the bugs youll encounter
